name: Prana Elana Cozy Up Dress - Women's
description:
Prana has done the impossible, made a super-comfortable dress look crisply presentable. Made with light, sustainable hemp, the Elana Cozy Up dress easily keeps your cool.Natural hemp blend uses recycled fibers, and has a flattering drape.Stripes are 55% hemp, 30% recycled polyester, 10% TENCEL™ Lyocell, 5% organic cotton.Solids are 55% hemp, 35% recycled polyester, 10% TENCEL™ Lyocell.Standard fit feels just right.
